ProductInfo.Features:
8 CH H.264 compression triplex real time industrial stand alone DVR with 2TB, 3.5" SATA hard drive. 8 channel video and 4 channel audio inputs
Two USB interface, one for data backup, one for mouse operation
Daylight saving time, PIP and EZOOM function. Live video, parameter setting and copy playback video via network
8 of 1/3'' CCD 420 TVL 3.6mm lens CCTV color night vision video security cameras
Package including: Digital Video Recorder, Manual, DVR Power adapter. 8 color night vision cameras, Camera Power Supplies, 1 pack 500ft RG59/18/2 Siamese cable, USB Mouse, Bonus surveillance Decals
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 8 Channel H.264 Security Surveillance Network DVR Digital Video Recorder Recording Security System 2000GB Hard Drive, 8 Day Night Vision CCD Security Cameras and 500ft RG59 Cable Fused to 18/2 Cable 1Y9
